sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Grid, Image, CardMeta, CardHeader, CardDescription, CardContent, Card, Icon, Segment, } from 'semantic-ui-react'; const Teams = () => { // Example data array of team members const teamMembers = [ { id: 1, name: 'Daniel', avatar: 'https://react.semantic-ui.com/images/avatar/large/daniel.jpg', joinedYear: 2016, description: 'Daniel is a comedian living in Nashville.', friendsCount: 10, }, { id: 2, name: 'Ella', avatar: 'https://react.semantic-ui.com/images/avatar/large/elliot.jpg', joinedYear: 2018, description: 'Ella is an artist based in Los Angeles.', friendsCount: 8, }, { id: 3, name: 'Grace', avatar: 'https://react.semantic-ui.com/images/avatar/large/daniel.jpg', joinedYear: 2017, description: 'Grace is a writer from New York City.', friendsCount: 12, }, { id: 4, name: 'John', avatar: 'https://react.semantic-ui.com/images/avatar/large/jenny.jpg', joinedYear: 2019, description: 'John is a software engineer working remotely.', friendsCount: 15, }, { id: 5, name: 'Matthew', avatar: 'https://react.semantic-ui.com/images/avatar/large/matthew.png', joinedYear: 2015, description: 'Matthew is a teacher passionate about education.', friendsCount: 7, }, { id: 6, name: 'Lily', avatar: 'https://react.semantic-ui.com/images/avatar/large/daniel.jpg', joinedYear: 2020, description: 'Lily is a photographer exploring nature photography.', friendsCount: 11, }, { id: 7, name: 'Oliver', avatar: 'https://react.semantic-ui.com/images/avatar/large/daniel.jpg', joinedYear: 2018, description: 'Oliver is a chef experimenting with new cuisines.', friendsCount: 9, }, { id: 8, name: 'Sophia', avatar: 'https://react.semantic-ui.com/images/avatar/large/daniel.jpg', joinedYear: 2016, description: 'Sophia is a marketer passionate about digital trends.', friendsCount: 14, }, { id: 9, name: 'William', avatar: 'https://react.semantic-ui.com/images/avatar/large/daniel.jpg', joinedYear: 2017, description: 'William is an architect designing sustainable buildings.', friendsCount: 6, }, { id: 10, name: 'Ava', avatar: 'https://react.semantic-ui.com/images/avatar/large/ade.jpg', joinedYear: 2019, description: 'Ava is a musician composing her debut album.', friendsCount: 13, }, ]; const navigate = useNavigate(); const navigateTo = () => { navigate('/team') } return (

Teams
{teamMembers.map(member => (
{member.name} Joined in {member.joinedYear} {member.description} {member.friendsCount} Friends
))}
); }; export default Teams;
